panel.title: FQDN from TLS Cert Canonical Names and Subject Alternate Names

table.title: Excludes seed apex domains, seed subdomains and discovered subdomains

search.query:
`easm_index` sourcetype="easm:tls_cert" NOT subject_dn IN ("*microsoft*", "*wpengine.com*") | rename subject_an{} as subject_an | rex mode=sed field=subject_an "s/^\*\.//g" | rex mode=sed field=subject_cn "s/^\*\.//g" | table easm.entity, hostname, subject_an, subject_cn | eval subject = mvappend(subject_an, subject_cn) | eval subject = mvdedup(subject) | stats count by subject, easm.entity, hostname
| lookup apex_domains.csv target as subject | where isnull(entity) | lookup discovered_subdomains.csv hostname as subject | where isnull(entity) | stats values(hostname) as hostname by easm.entity, subject | eval hostname = mvjoin(hostname,",")
